description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for a notes API backend, including a functional handler for listing notes and placeholder routes for CRUD operations.

methods.name: Express.js route handler for GET /
methods.description: Handles requests to list all notes by calling db.list() and returning the results.

methods.name: Role of placeholder routes (POST, GET by id, PUT, DELETE)
methods.description: Stub implementations returning 501 status for future CRUD functionalities.
